feed.title: Sault Ste. Marie - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Sault Ste. Marie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:00 a.m. EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, 1.1Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sault Ste. Marie Airport 3:00 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: 1.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 3 km
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 0.9°C
Wind: ENE 19 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with freezing drizzle changing to rain mixed with snow this afternoon. Local blowing snow. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets and freezing rain beginning near midnight. Blowing snow overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending in the afternoon then clearing. Snow mixed with ice pellets and freezing rain early in the morning. Blowing snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 40 gusting to 60 early in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 13. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High plus 1. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low zero.
entry.summary: Flurries. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
